Interface FileDataInput

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable, java.io.DataInput
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompressedRandomAccessReader, CompressedThrottledReader, MappedFileDataInput, RandomAccessReader, ThrottledReader

    public interface FileDataInput
extends java.io.DataInput, java.io.Closeable
